short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch Live is an extension that brings your followed Twitch streamers into a clean, modern, Twitch-styled interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- available for both Chrome and Firefox
- available in dark and light mode
- open-source: https://github.com/netistul/Twitch-Live
